item.description:
Let's join the Greater Boston Divorced & Separated and the North Shore Separated / Divorced Support group for this event:

Please join me at the MFA after work on friday november 2nd

MFA First Fridays is on the first Friday of each month from 5:30–9:30 pm.

Relax and unwind in a beautiful setting with friends both old and new. Join us for fine art, music, cash bars featuring signature cocktails, and delicious tapas available for purchase.

Open to visitors 21+. Valid ID with proof of age required for entry.

Come and join us for an evening of socializing at the end of a hard work week. Stroll through the museum and enjoy the art or stay and chat with other members of our group.

Free with MFA admission ($25!!) You might be able to get a less expensive ticket at your local library, or through friends who are members.

Let's meet in the lobby near the statue of Orpheus and Cerberus at 6:00pm. Please post a photo so we can recognize each other!

 

NOTE TO MFA MEMBERS:  Now you can reserve tickets to this event free, online.  Just sign on to your MFA account.
item.how_to_find_us: we'll be waiting for you in front of the statue of Orpheus and Cerberus in the lobby.
item.name: First Friday at the MFA. Music, signature cocktails, tapas and art.
